description: This file sets up a knowledge base using a PDF URL and a MongoDB vector database, then creates an agent to interact with the knowledge base, including asynchronous loading and response printing.

classes.name: PDFUrlKnowledgeBase
classes.description: A knowledge base class that loads PDF content from URLs and integrates with a vector database.

classes.name: MongoDb
classes.description: A class representing a MongoDB vector database connection.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: An agent class that interacts with the knowledge base and handles responses.

methods.name: aload
methods.description: Asynchronously loads the knowledge base content, optionally recreating the index.

methods.name: aprint_response
methods.description: Asynchronously prints the response to a query, optionally in markdown format.
